languages.text: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).
languages.original_text: Находясь в полном укрытии от атак определенного противника, солдат наносит ему на 10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше, а этот противник наносит на 20% меньше урона солдату и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытию{/g}, если оно существует на момент выстрела (даже если этот выстрел его уничтожает).

traits.locale_text: While the Marksman has full cover against an enemy, the Marksman gains +10% damage against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal -20% less damage against the Marksman and their cover if the cover is present at the moment of the shot (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

While the Marksman has full cover against an enemy, the Marksman gains +10% damage against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Marksman and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

languages.text: Находясь в полном укрытии от атак определенного противника, солдат наносит ему на 10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше, а этот противник наносит на 20% меньше урона солдату и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытию{/g}, если оно существует на момент выстрела (даже если этот выстрел его уничтожает).
languages.original_text: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

traits.locale_text: Находясь в полном укрытии от атак определенного противника, стрелок наносит ему на 10% урона больше, а этот противник наносит на 20% меньше урона стрелку и укрытию, если оно существует на момент выстрела (даже если этот выстрел его уничтожает).

Находясь в полном укрытии от атак определенного противника, стрелок наносит ему на 10% урона больше, а этот противник наносит на 20% меньше урона стрелку и укрытию, если оно существует на момент выстрела (даже если этот выстрел его уничтожает).

languages.text: 当士兵躲在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}后攻击敌人时，士兵对该名敌人造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%。当敌人朝士兵射击时，在掩体存在的情况下，敌人的攻击对士兵与掩体本身造成的伤害减少20%。即使敌人此次攻击摧毁了掩体，此伤害减免效果依然生效。
languages.original_text: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

traits.locale_text: 当士兵躲在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}后攻击敌人时，士兵对该名敌人造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%。当敌人朝士兵射击时，在掩体存在的情况下，敌人的攻击对士兵与掩体本身造成的伤害减少20%。即使敌人此次攻击摧毁了掩体，此伤害减免效果依然生效。

languages.text: Mientras el soldado tenga {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura total{/g} contra un enemigo, gana un +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra ese enemigo, y los ataques del enemigo infligen un −20 % menos de daño al soldado y a su cobertura si esta estaba presente en el momento en que se produjo el disparo (incluso aunque la cobertura resulte destruida por el disparo).
languages.original_text: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

traits.locale_text: Mientras el tirador de élite tenga {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g} total contra un enemigo, gana un +10 % de daño contra ese enemigo, y los ataques del enemigo infligen un −20 % menos de daño al tirador de élite y a su cobertura si esta ya estaba presente en el momento en que se produjo el disparo (incluso aunque la cobertura resulte destruida por el disparo).

languages.text: Während der Soldat volle {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} vor einem Feind hat, erhält er +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} gegen diesen Feind. Außerdem fügen die Angriffe des Feindes dem Soldaten und seiner Deckung -20 % weniger Schaden zu, wenn die Deckung zum Zeitpunkt des Schusses steht (selbst wenn sie durch den Schuss zerstört wird).
languages.original_text: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

traits.locale_text: Während der Scharfschütze volle {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckung{/g} vor einem Feind hat, erhält er +10 % Schaden gegen diesen Feind. Außerdem fügen die Angriffe des Feindes dem Scharfschützen und seiner Deckung −20 % weniger Schaden zu, wenn die Deckung zum Zeitpunkt des Schusses steht (selbst wenn sie durch den Schuss zerstört wird).

languages.text: Tant qu'un soldat dispose d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} totale contre un ennemi, il bénéficie de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} contre cet ennemi, et les attaques de l'ennemi infligent 20 % de dégâts en moins au soldat et à sa couverture si celle-ci est présente au moment du tir (même si la couverture est détruite par le tir).
languages.original_text: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

traits.locale_text: Tant qu'un Tireur d'Élite dispose d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g} totale contre un ennemi, il bénéficie de +10 % de dégâts contre cet ennemi, et les attaques de l'ennemi infligent -20 % de dégâts en moins au Tireur d'Élite et à sa couverture si celle-ci est présente au moment du tir (même si la couverture est détruite par le tir).

languages.text: 兵士が敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全遮蔽{/g}に隠れている時、その敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+10%され、その敵から兵士と遮蔽に対するダメージが-20%される（遮蔽が射撃で破壊されたとしても、射撃時に遮蔽が存在していれば効果は発揮される。
languages.original_text: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).

traits.locale_text: マークスマンが敵に対して完全{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}に隠れている時、その敵に対するダメージが+10%され、その敵からマークスマンと遮蔽に対するダメージが-20%される（遮蔽が射撃で破壊されたとしても、射撃時に遮蔽が存在していれば効果は発揮される。
